name: FDAApprovedTobaccoCessationMedications
title: FDA Approved Tobacco Cessation Medications
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains medications that represent FDA approved tobacco cessation medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Medication. The intent of this data element is to identify tobacco cessation medications.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic Clinical Drug-level FDA-approved smoking cessation medications in any dose form.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that are not FDA-approved smoking cessation medications.)
